channel.title: How i insert npcs and shops?
channel.description:
ok im seeing this, but how i insert a npc! people please add me and help me now! When my server is online, who helped me, will be MOD OR ADMIN! help me please!
i need help to insert shops and npcs....help me and can be mod!!
add me all to help and more, my msn is faivmu@hotmail.com im online!

item.title: How i insert npcs and shops?
item.dc:creator: @_A-M #A-M
item.description:
@_A-M wrote:

slaps myself in the face no you add the code Before? doesnt that make sence it would be like if u were gunna try win 100000000 billion dollars, u would of done it before it closed or after it closed??? man thats hard… uhmm ctrl+f (search) no that doesnt matter just add the code before the [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] mmk…

item.title: How i insert npcs and shops?
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

okokok ty all! but before was tutorials in “tutorials” but now nothing!

i try to make a npc!..i must only replace old npcs or i can make news…

in autospawn says admin town…Highlvl training and each of this have a lot of npcs…in the end of all says [ENDOFSPAWNLIST], i must make the new npcs after or before this…with spaces or no!?

ahhh and i must press control+f before start modifing this?

item.title: How i insert npcs and shops?
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

[quote=“doggiedoo86, post:2, topic:125772”]Type ::npc (NPC ID) There is a npc when you end the server and start it over it will be gone. So go to the autospawn folder and place the npcs you need the coords for them to walk you need to put walk type 1 and enter the coords like x1 y1 x2 y2 could be something bla bla bla bla… Hope this helped[/quote]idiot…)refering to the ::npc comment…)

add him in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: How i insert npcs and shops?

item.title: How i insert npcs and shops?
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Type ::npc (NPC ID) There is a npc when you end the server and start it over it will be gone. So go to the autospawn folder and place the npcs you need the coords for them to walk you need to put walk type 1 and enter the coords like x1 y1 x2 y2 could be something bla bla bla bla… Hope this helped

Read full topic
